title: Effect of lactic acid fermentation on the physico-chemical, functional, and antioxidant properties, and in vitro protein digestibility of malted ragi (Eleusine coracana L.)
content:
Sustainable Food Technol., 2024, 2,1128-1138
DOI: 10.1039/D4FB00134F, Paper

Rahul Dev, Shriya Bhatt, Mahesh Gupta
Ragi is a widely recognized “Shree Anna” that should be included in diets to augment food diversity and security amid climate change challenges.
